name: WinTheLife
description:
Game made for Wowie Jam 3.0

https://itch.io/jam/wowie-jam-3

First ever publication - first ever attempt on finishing the game :)
Watch out as there are two endings available! :)

Game logic, some action logic, level design and story by me

Character movement by unity (level one)

3d asset pack sample scene used only for pictures.

3d art by POLYGON

Music by John Leonard French



Quick mix of asset bought cheap in bundles:
Unity Standard Assets
POLYGON City pack
Universal Sound FX megapack
Ultimate Game Music Collection by John Leonard French
